title: Historic Site
lore: You've seen many architectural masterpieces but there are only a few buildings in a city that lets you take a glimpse into the past. Take your time to think about the past and the future. Explore its surroundings and learn its lessons. You think this will help you on your journey.
action: you get curious about the misteries of the past

title: Memories of the old
lore: Only few people know why this place is so important for the culture of this country. You might become one of these people if you look close enough... or from far enough. It's your call.
action: you feel that an important place needs to be discovered somewhere around here

title: Scout and explore!
lore: An experienced traveler can also get lost in a new city. Finding a good spot to explore your surrounding can be crucial to your navigation.
action: you take the opportunity to get to a vantage point

title: Don't look down!
lore: Wandering aimlessly won't take you closer to your goal. Provided your goal is not that exact thing: to wander around aimlessly.
action: an excellent lookout spot gives you the opportunity to take in the scenery

title: Frozen in time
lore: Can anyone travel to the past? Not even a mage can do it, but a sculpture garden can give you quite a good impression. As you are walking among the great historical figures it seems like these people were frozen in time.
action: a nearby place gives off a misterious and chilly vibe

title: The Garden of Sculptures
lore: - Why did the famous people got famous in the first place anyway? What did they do to deserve such recognition? - you think to yourself while taking the route to The Garden of Sculptures to meet the famous people ... of the past times.
action: you wonder how famous people looked

title: Burglar by the river
lore: A goblin has picked your pocket. I think you should look for him by the riverside. Maybe can find him there, maybe not, either way, the view will be astonishing.
action: you feel that something is missing from your trip

title: Fairies on the water
lore: - Are..?  Are those really aqua fairies..?! - you mumble. In fact they are. Those who have never seen them them only come here to spend some time near the waterfront.
action: a strangely familiar feeling comes from the direction of a nearby body of water

title: Trees of hope
lore: They say that you can find Oogle the wise in the nearby forest. You have to find him... or her. Although you are not quite sure who you are going to find there, one thing is for certain: a relaxing journey is ahead of you.
action: you receive questionable information about a wise person in the woods

title: Magical forest
lore: You should go hiking on the magical path where the trees will heal you while you enjoy your journey. This sounds like a really great idea.
action: you hear the calling of the wild
